channel.title: Comments on: Episode #11: The End of Money

item.title: By: artstateofmind@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: artstateofmind@gmail.com
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-11/#comment-4">shmadz</a>.
Thanks so much!

item.title: By: shmadz
item.dc:creator: shmadz
item.description:
I like the laid back feel, relaxed and unconcerned.
I especially liked when the one guy said "don't bother sending us visa or PayPal, just send your bitcoins" (paraphrasing)
I'd like to send bitcoins, but I can't find your address... Whether or not I'm a big idiot, your address needs to be more accessible, make it prominent! Make it public!
I guess I might click on that "donate bitcoins" button, but that just seems like cheating.
Anyways, great show, best of luck
item.content:encoded:
I like the laid back feel, relaxed and unconcerned.

I especially liked when the one guy said “don’t bother sending us visa or PayPal, just send your bitcoins” (paraphrasing)

I’d like to send bitcoins, but I can’t find your address… Whether or not I’m a big idiot, your address needs to be more accessible, make it prominent! Make it public!

I guess I might click on that “donate bitcoins” button, but that just seems like cheating.

Anyways, great show, best of luck
